channel.title: Copy of Digg top 24 hours
channel.description: RSS feed with direct links to popular technology articles. based on superdigg pipe

item.title: [+2779] The Perfect Comeback (Facebook Argument)
item.description: Facebook arguments are just a daily routine, but ending an argument with a perfect punch is awesome. And itâ€™s even more awesome when you finish it off with proper punctuations and grammar.

item.title: [+1875] Rachel Maddow Pwns Bill O'Reilly (video)
item.description: BillO: We kick your butt in ratings, madam.Maddow: .....

item.title: [+1244] Slim Woman Booted From Flight So Fatty Can Have Two Seats
item.description: To add insult to injury, the Southwest personnel berated her when she questioned the decision to boot her from the plane.

item.title: [+1207] Epic! Dexter Season 5 Trailer (Comic Con)
item.description: Dexter Season 5 Trailer from Comic-Con 2010. Sins may be forgiven but conscience is a killer. Season five premieres Sunday, September 26th.

item.title: [+714] Study: Men Suffer More in Crappy Relationships Than Women Do
item.description: A study of over 1600 Miamians, aged 18 to 23, surveyed by The Journal of Health and Social Behavior (and translated out of academese by the New York Times), reported, "It appears that young men benefit more than women from support, and that they are more harmed than women by strain in ongoing romantic relationships."

item.title: [+605] Avengers Team Revealed, Assemble on Stage; Whedon Cries
item.description: Samuel L. Jackson as Nick Fury. Clark Gregg as Agent Coulson. Scarlett Johansson as Black Widow. Chris Hemsworth as Thor. Chris Evans as Captain America. Robert Downey Jr as Iron Man. Jeremy Renner as Hawkeye. Mark Ruffallo as The Hulk. Joss Whedon had tears in his eyes. He said, "I had a dream all my life and it wasn't this good."

item.title: [+602] Pirates of the Caribbean 4 Teaser Trailer Arrives
item.description: Captain Jack sits on a screen and rambles endlessly about his next adventure, and then promises everyone watching Bloody Marys. Bloody Marys all around!

item.title: [+599] Marijuana Church Founder Deemed 'Too Dangerous for Bail'
item.description: A Hawaii-based marijuana minister who has for years been preaching the good news about ganja is now under federal indictment, and agents on Friday managed to persuade a federal judge that he is somehow "too dangerous" to be allowed out on bail. Roger Christie, the founder of The Hawaii Cannabis Ministry (THC Ministry), has been ordered...

item.title: [+589] CO2 Could be Decreased To Pre-Industrial Levels in 10 Years
item.description: A new solar-powered process could decrease carbon dioxide to pre-industrial levels in 10 years

item.title: [+496] Washington Post: It's time to end ethanol subsidies
item.description: At this point, the question should not be whether to allow corn ethanol's tax incentives and trade protections to expire. The debate should be about why corn ethanol deserves any federal protection at all. There are certainly more effective ways to reduce oil consumption.

item.title: [+496] WTF? Dell Drops All Ubuntu-Loaded Machines From Online Store
item.description: It's as if a million penguins cried out in terror, and were suddenly silenced.

item.title: [+480] Dosing Kids with Drugs to Shut Them Up is Child Abuse
item.description: Dr. Shan Yin, a toxicology fellow at the University of Colorado, led the study and concluds that there are at least 160 reported cases a year where parents severely and maliciously control their children with drugs. The key word there is "reported." Countless more cases fly under the radar.
